snippet.title: Kirby and the Forgotten Land – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Star-Crossed World – Nintendo Direct
snippet.description:
Kirby and the Forgotten Land – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Star-Crossed World is coming to Nintendo Switch 2 on Aug. 28, 2025.

In Star-Crossed World, a new story included in the upgrade pack, Kirby must use his abilities, including the all-new Mouthful Modes, to clear a trail through uncharted territory. The upgrade pack will include this new content which can be played in single-player and local co-op, as well as improved performance for the entire game.

#NintendoDirect #NintendoSwitch2

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://www.nintendo.com/us/

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot
